name: egg is broken. heart is too.
description: You are a chicken. Break into a restaurant kitchen and rescue your precious baby egg from the clutches of evil, hungry humans. You can do it. You have the power of motherly love.
minimum_requirements: 最低配備: 作業系統: Windows 7 SP1+ 處理器: CPU with SSE2 instruction set support 記憶體: 100 MB 記憶體 顯示卡: Graphics Card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities DirectX: 版本：10 儲存空間: 200 MB 可用空間
